text: Caligula may not have died like this, but she must have died like this. The barbarian tetrarch - being three times brutal - ordered those who left that night with red vestments to be killed by his centurions. The implacable had a reserved appointment that night, and in the blur of the rush, the very idiot forgot his own order and plunged into the red robe, being killed by his own guard upon leaving the palace. FIN
title: Verdadera falsa muerte de Calígula
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
